solution_line_template: If {num_big_boxes} big boxes are fit {small_boxes_per_big_box} small boxes each, the number of small boxes is {small_boxes_per_big_box}*{num_big_boxes} = <<{num_big_boxes}*{small_boxes_per_big_box}={total_small_boxes}>>{total_small_boxes}

Since the small boxes have {candles_per_small_box} candles each, there are {candles_per_small_box}*{total_small_boxes} = <<{candles_per_small_box}*{total_small_boxes}={total_candles}>>{total_candles} candles in total.
